title: CEP Test Vector Manifest Schema
description: Schema for the index of all test vector files for cross-implementation verification.

$id.description: The canonical URI for this manifest file.

manifestVersion.description: The version of the manifest schema itself.

generatedAt.description: The date the manifest file was generated (YYYY-MM-DD).

vectors.description: A list of test vector categories.

implementationNotes.description: Notes for users on how to interpret and use the manifest data.

VectorCategory.description: A top-level category of test vectors (e.g., SNFEI, Entity).

name.description: The key name of the category (e.g., 'snfei', 'entity').

description.description: A description of the category's purpose.

versions.description: A list of specification versions for this category.

VectorVersion.description: A specific version of a test vector set.

status.description: The current status of this vector set.

specVersion.description: The version of the underlying CEP specification being tested.

files.description: A list of relative paths to the test vector files.

deprecationNote.description: Optional: A note explaining why the version is deprecated.
